"Katsuragi": "You will?! Oh, this helps so much. Alright, please let me explain."
"The other day, while in the Dreisen Plant, a scouting party encountered a certain group of DOLLS."
"It seems that, compared to the average DOLLS, they had a noticeably different, heavy presence to them..."
"No sooner had they engaged the DOLLS than they quickly found themselves overpowered, with no choice but to retreat."
"We've been referring to this group of DOLLS as \"Recon Gigantix\"."
"We'd like to work out a plan to counter them before anyone's seriously injured, but..."
"As always, we lack the forces to spare..."
"Which is why I'd like to ask you to go there and collect data on them."
"We're not sure how strong the targets are, so this time I just want you to make contact."
"...Of course, if you could defeat them as well, that would work..."
"I've said this before, but please take utmost care out there."
